body.name: Click N' Play Magic Toy Set, Play Baby Bottles with Disappearing Milk & Juice, Doll Accessories for Kids & Toddlers, Great Gift for Little Girls Ages 2-4

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Click N' Play Store

features: Doll-Sized Bottles - This set includes one baby milk bottle and one juice bottle that both contain the magic disappearing fluid. Bottles are decorated with cute graphics and have an easy grip for young children

Endless Fun - The juice and milk will magically disappear from the bottle as the doll drinks them. The fluid in each bottle will begin to decrease as the bottle is tilted, giving a real impression that the baby doll is drinking.

Stimulate Children’s Interest- When the doll drinks the milk and juice bottles, the liquid will magically disappear! Watching the doll drink the bottle will stimulate children's interest, curiosity about the world. Playing with the magic baby doll bottles can help improve a child’s learning and creative ability.
Great gift idea – This set makes a great gift idea for kids and a great addition to your daughter's baby doll accessories!
Toys for Children - Recommended for children ages 2+ years old. Do not allow children to put the bottles in their mouths.
body.description: Click N’ Play has a new toy in its doll accessory collection – with the doll feeding bottle your kids will be able to pretend play as they really feeding them and caring for their dolls. The magic disappearing milk and juice are filled with “milk” and “juice” and they disappear when tilted in an upward position as if the baby doll is “drinking”. These are the perfect fun and doll activity for all ages.

Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magic doll bottles
reviews.reviewText: This are nice bottles for pretend play and the girls love them to feed there dollbabies! Not real big, but not to small either! My girls loved them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brought back childhood memories
reviews.reviewText: Ok to be fair it could be a 5 star product to another person . I’m just saying to me I expected a bit more action . Maybe it will work better the longer we have it . When you flip it upside down it does empty out like it is being consumed however it doesn’t all disappear . It ends up lookig like the baby doll drank like 3/4 of it or maybe 5/8ths . That’s my only dislike about this set and the questions they raised by my kid about do people really give newborns OJ? Or carrot juice ? I told her no not newborns but toddlers yes and that satisfied those questions. Overall they work good , to others who didn’t grow up playing with them it would be a 5 star product . It came in basic packaging, good gift .You get both the milk (white) and orange bottles in the pack . It says it is Made in China

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and bottle looks full when upright
reviews.reviewText: I liked that the bottles look full when upright and empty well when turned. A competitors product looked half empty so I bought these instead and work well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far they’ve survived a 2 year old throwing them on hardwoods. Great accessory for the baby doll phase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are the “magic” type that look like baby doll is actually drinking and that feature is perfect just as it should be. Comes with one milk bottle and one juice bottle the bottles are a good size not too big and not too small to be choking hazards my two year old holds them easily. We’ve had them almost a year now and they show no signs of damage or breaking.
